author: g11tech
content:
in normal synced nodes, the chain will just progress even if EL nodes don't connect (although there would be some issues in txpool txs propagation)

so imo its more important for CLs to have forkversion updates than ELs to have forkid updates because they are primary driver of the chain

author: g11tech
content:
so ethereumjs view is:

1. if its a normal fork treatment affecting forkid then we will add 5 bpo forks statically to the code (and we will add more later when the need arises). 

2. if its not a normal fork treatment, then we will allow dynamic specification of bpos in blobsschedule
